𓊥 𓊤 𓊦 𓄢

𓊥 steering ⇔ 𐃆 spear

𓊦 rudder tail 𓄢 rear oar 𐃆 spear

𓊤 cryder c'rudder

RU 𒊒 ⇔ 𓐑𓏏𓊤 rudder, oar
PÀD 𒅆𒊒 ⇔ 𓐑𓏏𓊤 paddel 𒄐 𓊥 𓊤 𓊦 𓄢

𓊦 ⋍ 𓊤 ⋍ 𓃀
𒉺𒊑𒋢 pa-ri-su peräsin@Uralic руль “rudder”
𒉺𒊑𒋢 rudder •pruder ⇔ πηδάλιον pēdálion Paddel 𓃀 rear oar 𓊦

𒄐 = 𒄞𒄑 GIŠ+UL GISAL (𒌌 UL)

अरित्र aritra a'Ruder

руль rulʹ ruler “guide”

steer

𓈝 steer
𓎛 𓈞 𓄿 | steering-oar |
𓋴 𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 | weave, spin (yarn) |
𓋴 𓏏 𓍔 𓄿 𓅱 𓍬 | dragging | stieren : steer
𓋴 𓃀 𓈖 𓂻 | glide away (of snakes), steer off course, diverge | spin++ / ⇔
𓋴 𓃀 𓈖 𓅪 | alienate (relatives, property) | spin++
𓋴 𓃀 𓈖 𓆛 𓂻 | glide away (of snakes), steer off course, diverge |
𓋴 𓃀 𓈖 𓏌 | fish | sphnur ⇔ spineor spNar / pshnur ⇔ fishener
𓌴 𓐙 𓂝 𓂻 | steer (ship), extend (limbs), paddle (water) |
𓌴 𓐙 𓂝 𓂻 | lead, guide, direct, send, despatch, throw out (rope from ship) |
𓆓 𓋴 𓂋 𓂦 𓐑 𓏏 𓏥 | row, steer, ply one's oar | 𓐑 𓏏 𓏥 ?
𓆓 𓋴 𓂋 𓂦 𓐑 𓏏 𓏥 𓅓 | steer |
